articles.title: Steve Cropper, guitarist and member of Stax Records’ Booker T and the M.G.’s, has died at age 84
articles.description:
Cropper was a Stax artist before the label was even called Stax, which Jim Stewart and Estelle Axton had founded as Satellite Records in 1957.

articles.title: 2 people enter Orange Line tracks from train after train stops, opens doors in between stations, MBTA says
articles.description:
"While the doors were open, the train never moved. … Two passengers exited the train into the track area – they did not fall out, but exited on their own,” an MBTA spokesperson said.
